sk1.name: Split Earth
sk1.desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

sk2.name: Diabolic Edict
sk2.desc: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal mixed damage to enemy units and structures. The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts 8 seconds.

sk3.name: Lightning Storm
sk3.desc: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then jumps to nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed by 75%% for 0.5 seconds.

sk4.name: Pulse Nova
sk4.desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
